message: I propose a fair split.  Let's get this over with quickly!
You're not being very generous, are you?
Let's try this again. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me.
You're still being stingy, but I'll take what I can get.
This is my final offer. I'm not willing to go any lower. If you reject this, we both lose a lot of money.
You're not going to get away with getting most of the money that easily!
I'm still willing to split the money fairly, but time is running out. Let's reach an agreement.
You're getting desperate, aren't you? I'm not going to let you get the better of me!
We're running out of time. Let's split the money evenly and call it a day.
